issue.title: Can you check contacts for cable joints too?

content.raw:
The way I manipulate the cable is far from ideal and very time consuming. This is what I do:

1. Click on the cable, then click again on the tip so only the tip is selected
1. Right-click and choose Apply Force/Torque
1. Pause simulation
1. Using the dialog, apply a few Newtons in the direction you want the cable to go
1. Then instead of pressing play, step through the simulation little by little
1. Go back to step 4
